SUBTITLE_1: The SoWell project aims to define new metrics to measure well-being in societies.
QUESTION_2: How can we measure variations of Mood in time?
SUBTITLE_2: Harvesting queries from millions of internet users, we map facets of people's feelings and preoccupations.
SUBTITLE_3: Using new poll modeling techniques, we pinpoint key factors for a quantitative definition of Happiness. X millions people were surveyed.
